snippet.title: Schbibinman Zero - Shockman Zero - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In 1997, Kaizou Choujin Schbibinman Zero was released not on a cartridge but via satellite download on the Super Famicom® Satellaview in Japan.  Now the adventure of our cybernetic citizens, Raita and Azumi, has finally arrived to the West.  Officially translated on a 16-bit cartridge, now Schbibinman Zero - Shockman Zero can join your collection!

retro-bit.com/shockman-zero/

Pre-order this collection from June 25th through July 28th, 2024.

Stay up to date with all of our releases!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/RetroBitGaming
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Retrobitgaming/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/retrobit_gaming

#schbibinman
#retro-bit
#shockman
